scripts.compile-amd-all: npm run compile-amd-client && npm run compile-amd-specs
scripts.bundle-client: npm run compile-client && browserify dist_client/Program.js -o dist_client/bundle.client.js
scripts.release-client: npm run bundle-client && npm run uglify-client
scripts.bundle-specs: npm run compile-specs && browserify dist_specs/src_specs/Calculator.spec.js -o dist_specs/bundle.specs.js
scripts.release-specs: npm run bundle-specs && npm run uglify-specs
scripts.release-all: npm run release-client && npm run release-specs
